Home / Attributes / Arrangement

Arrangement

The different arrangements can be used to (i) visualize interconnection_type features or (ii) compare two different sequences in the context of comparative genomics.

Circular Parallel

2 tools

Edgar Genome Browser

MizBee

Circular Serial

A serial circular arrangement corresponds to two sequence axes in a “half-circle” layout.

2 tools

Circos

ClicO Free Service
